description: Replication of Bottenhorn et al. (2018) meta-analysis of naturalistic fMRI paradigms
exclusion_criteria: task based on static, timed blocks of stimuli were presented with a well-defined window for participant response
study assessed training or learning across multiple trials or across some period of practice (e.g., pre vs. post contrasts)
study does not report brain activation locations in a three-dimensional, standardized coordinate space
participants with any history of neurological or psychiatric diagnosis
inclusion_criteria: subjects perform naturalistic fMRI tasks in the scanner
